English: Meaningless. It is truly meaningless...!
Chinese: 无意义。实在是太无意义了……！

English: There is no world that can harbor the faithless.
Chinese: 没有世界可容无信仰之人生存。

English: Then perish...!
Hah...
Shall I spread death and wither the verdant fields?
Chinese: 要播撒死亡，令绿野枯萎吗。

English: Get to work.
Can you hear the tolling of the bell...?
Surrender your head...!
I am but bones... destined to return to the earth...
Chinese: 吾本为骸骨……唯有回归大地……

English: My fate ends here.
Ooooooooooh!
Let corpses pile upon this ground.
Like building a tower of corpses.
I hear the bell's toll... Today's heads feel particularly heavy...
Chinese: 听到了钟声……今日仿佛有特别沉重的首级呢……

English: I am but a wraith lurking in darkness. I hold no individual desires. I merely obey your will.
Chinese: 吾不过是潜藏于黑暗中的亡灵。没有身为个体的欲望。只会服从汝之意向。

English: A master-servant bond is an exchange of purpose. You preserve life, I return it to the cycle. All is light and shadow, my contractor.
Chinese: 主从乃是使命的交换。汝拯救生命，吾令生命回归。一切皆为光与影啊，契约者。

English: ...Perhaps due to the long passage of time. Even under the light, my heart remains undisturbed.
Chinese: ……或许因为漫长的时光所致。即使在光之下，吾之心也不会被扰乱。

English: Though you are a heretic... you seem trustworthy. Your soul shines brightly. An unshakable spirit is precisely what we require...
Chinese: 汝虽为异教徒……但似乎是值得信任之人。尤其是心灵很美。不会被任何事物所动摇的精神，才是吾等所必须的……

English: A splendid journey. Splendid memories. A splendid... truly splendid end. I wish to truly vanish after this battle concludes, my contractor.
Chinese: 美妙的旅程。美妙的回忆。美妙的……实为美妙的吾之终结。真希望在这次战斗结束后，能够真正消失，吾之契约者啊。

English: Ah... ahhh... ah...
O Lord. My life has found salvation's light here.
Chinese: 主啊。吾之人生，已在此获得了救济之光。

English: The oracle has descended...!
Tch...!
A push from behind.
I accept this duty.
You've made your choice.
No matter the path of suffering, we must charge forward courageously.
Chinese: 无论什么样的苦难之路，都只能勇往直前。

English: As long as this banner stands, we shall not fall!
Chinese: 只要这面旗帜还在，就不会溃败！

English: Right there!
This is the spot.
My deepest gratitude.
Now, prepare yourself!
Leave it to me! Stay behind me!
Chinese: 请交给我吧，站在我的背后！

English: Let the Lord's divine work manifest here!
Purge them!
To think... it would end here...
This... can't be...
Let us begin! May the Lord grant me strength.
Chinese: 要上了啊！请主赐予我力量。

English: If we cannot advance without fighting, then we shall strike down our foes!
Chinese: 不战斗就不能前进的话，那就打倒敌人吧！

English: I feel slightly stronger.
Chinese: 好像稍微变强了一些呢。

English: Further improvement. One could call it a leap forward.
Chinese: 继续提升。可称之为飞跃吧。

English: I will remain by your side always. Through suffering and sorrow, we shall overcome them together! Come, let us strive onward, Master!
Chinese: 无论何时，都与您相伴。无论是苦难还是悲叹，只要与您在一起，一定能够克服！来吧，一起努力吧，御主！

English: Indeed, I am your Servant. My duty is to protect and guide you to the best of my ability.
Chinese: 嗯，我确实是您的从者。我的职责是尽可能保护您、引导您。

English: As your Servant and you as Master, we must continue working together!
Chinese: 我作为从者，您作为御主，我们彼此今后也要一起努力哦！

English: Master, you won't become a proper Master if we don't venture out soon.
Chinese: 御主，再不出门的话，可当不了一个优秀的御主哦？

English: Though I know not of chivalric codes, I understand what a standard-bearer must do. Stay close, Master.
Chinese: 尽管我不知道什么是骑士的准则，但作为一名持旗之人该做什么，我还是很清楚的。一定要紧紧跟上我哦，御主。

English: I can endure!
Forgive me, but I shall crush you!
Chinese: 非常抱歉，但我要击溃你！

English: ...Ah, forgive me, Master.
Now, prepare yourself!
Leave it to me.
Understood.
Tend to the wounded. The battle continues.
Chinese: 为伤者治疗。战斗还将继续。

English: Still lacking refinement.
Witness my full power...!
The time to decide the outcome has come...
Splendid.
Stay calm and vigilant.
Chinese: 冷静下来，不要掉以轻心。

English: All forces, prepare to charge...!
Target eliminated!
Bring victory to this path!
To fall... here of all places...
Mere child's play...!
Let us begin, Master.
Come at me with everything you've got.
Chinese: 拼尽所有实力放马过来吧。

English: Even restored to my kingly form, our oath remains. My holy sword is yours to command.
Chinese: 就算恢复成作为王那时的模样，我们的誓约也不会改变。我的圣剑任由您的差遣。

English: Your instructions bring strange comfort. A warmth I cannot explain. Should my blade retain any power, I shall wield it wholeheartedly for you, Master.
Chinese: 您的指示让人感觉很舒心。有种不可思议的暖意。若我的剑还存有些许力量，一定会全心全意帮助您的，御主。

English: We grow stronger still.
This is humanity's battle for salvation. Our burden is immense, Master.
Chinese: 这是为了拯救人类的战斗。我们的责任无比沉重，御主。

English: I once sought the Holy Grail for personal reasons, but that is past. Evil must be corrected.
Chinese: 我曾怀着某种原因执着于圣杯探索，但那已经是过去的事了。若为邪恶之物，那就必须纠正。

English: A Servant must obey their Master, but mutual trust is ideal.
Chinese: 从者必须服从御主，但如果双方能相互信赖就好了。

English: Yet... I confess. I once wondered: what life might I have led had I never drawn the Sword of Selection?
Chinese: 但是……对。我曾经有过小小的幻想。如若我没有拔出王之剑，那我将过上怎样的人生呢。

English: Hmm. I sense potential gains... Let us investigate.
Chinese: 嗯。有种收获的预感……去看看情况吧。

English: What do you think? I hope this meets your expectations.
Chinese: 您觉得如何？ 若能满足您的期待就好了。

English: A fine opportunity for instruction.
Chinese: 这是个好机会，我来好好教育你。

English: Forgive me, Master...
Simply defeat the enemy. That is all.
Leave it to me!
Very well—let us settle this!
